about:
I am Sean! A final year undergraduate from Singapore Management University, with a bachelors in Information Systems. I am a final year student from Singapore Management University (SMU) majoring in Information Systems.

I spend my free time watching dramas (specifically chinese historical/wuxia) and hunting for nice food/cafes.

Here are my top 5 drama recommendations:

dramas.name: Story of Yanxi Palace (延禧攻略)
The Deer and the Cauldron (鹿鼎记)
Who Rules the World (且试天下)
